div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1622 Safad (anc. Seph), Galilee, before 1877 (879) Burial: after 49 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 6+ AR Ascalon: tetradr. (latest yr. 55 = 49 B.C.) Disposition: London 3; Athens 2; Svoronos IV, pl. Î”, 25 de Saulcy, RN 1874-7, pp. 126-7 (= BMC 18-20) Feuardent, RN 1874-7, pp. 192-3 (= Athens, Svoronos II, 1878, 1883) Kadman, INCJ, hoard 8 For the Ascalon era see Brett, AJA 1937, pp. 452 ff.
